title: ollama/ollama
summary: Ollama’s official CLI and server that lets you pull, run, and manage GGUF models locally with a built-in Model-file DSL and REST API.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for the Ollama server; chat, generate, embed, pull, and manage models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers; chat, generate, embeddings, and model ops.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration that wraps Ollama endpoints for chat, generation, and embeddings inside LangChain runnables.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich ChatGPT-style web UI for Ollama (now “Open WebUI”) with multi-user, RAG, and plugin support.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; offers synchronous and asynchronous APIs plus Spring Boot starter.

title: ollama-cli (npm)
summary: Lightweight Node CLI wrapper around ollama-js for quick chat, model listing, and pulling from the terminal.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Turn any Ollama model into a GitHub Copilot-style code-completion service for VS Code and JetBrains.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama embeddings + Chroma to chat with local PDFs and Markdown.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack 2.x integration providing OllamaGenerator and OllamaEmbedder nodes for pipelines.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-host Discord bot that streams Ollama replies in any server channel with slash commands.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community-maintained C#/.NET client for Ollama with async IEnumerables and dependency injection helpers.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Official Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node selector and PVC model cache.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that spins up Ollama as a CI service for testing LLM-powered features in pipelines.

title: ollama-camunda
summary: Camunda 8 connector that exposes Ollama chat & embedding tasks inside BPMN processes.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing strongly-typed async bindings to the Ollama REST API with Tokio.

title: ollama-logseq
summary: Logseq plugin that sends selected blocks to Ollama for summarization or Q&A and writes results back.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian community plugin to run local LLMs via Ollama for note summarization and brainstorming.

title: ollama-keras
summary: Keras 3 callback that streams Ollama-generated text after each epoch for dynamic reporting.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack Bolt app that adds /ollama slash command to chat with any local model and supports threads.
